import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import s from './Card.module.scss' export const Card = ({data}) => { return(

{data.name}

{data.status}-{data.species}

Last known location:

{data.location.name}

Fist seen in:

Mortynight Run

 ) }
